content: *fun for halloween or all year round this soft monster toy is great for children or the young at heart lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70447ad skill level beginner a fun fur® article #320 2 balls b wool-ease® article #620 1 ball crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm polyester fiberfill small amount of green worsted weight yarn c for eye body is worked with 2 strands of a held together make 2 arms and legs are worked with 1 strand of b some assembly required to finish monsters in the set 70742ad circle 1 70743ad square 2 70744ad rectangle 3 70447ad triangle 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/circle-shaped-monster-70742ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/square-monster-70743ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rectangle-shaped-monster-70744ad
